PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-01442024-02-19NRCAN, ECCC
ActCanada-Nova Scotia Offshore Petroleum Resources Accord Implementation Act
SubjectCanadaâ€“Nova Scotia Offshore Area Petroleum Operations Framework Regulations
PrecisCANADA-NOVA SCOTIA OFFSHORE AREA PETROLEUM OPERATIONS FRAMEWORK REGULATIONS in order to (1) repeal and replace nine regulations with one consolidated framework regulation in each of the Canada-Nova Scotia offshore areas; and (2) align requirements related to safety, environmental protection and resource management with international codes and standards for petroleum activities.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0026 Publication Date: 2024-02-28
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: CANADA-NOVA SCOTIA OFFSHORE AREA PETROLEUM OPERATIONS FRAMEWORK REGULATIONS in order to (1) repeal and replace nine regulations with one consolidated framework regulation in each of the Canada-Nova Scotia offshore areas; and (2) align requirements related to safety, environmental protection and resource management with international codes and standards for petroleum activities.
